snippet: The Israeli military said on Wednesday that it had closed its inquiry into the deaths of at least 21 Palestinian family members during the 2009 Gaza war, and denied charges that forces deliberately attacked civilians.
abstract: Israeli military announces that it has closed its investigation into the 2009 deaths of at least 21 members of an extended Palestinian family who were huddled in a house that was struck by Israeli shells or missiles during the Gaza war, and that no legal steps would be taken against any soldiers involved.
lead_paragraph: The Israeli military said on Wednesday that it had closed its inquiry into the deaths of at least 21 Palestinian family members during the 2009 Gaza war, and denied charges that forces deliberately attacked civilians.

headline.seo: Israel Military Clears Soldiers in Deaths of Gaza Civilians
headline.main: Israel Military Clears Soldiers in Deaths of Gaza Civilians
headline.print_headline: Israel Military Closes Inquiry Into Deaths of Gaza Civilians
